meanings.sent1: The arrhythmic drumming made it hard to dance to the music.
meanings.sent2: The arrhythmic heartbeat worried the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The arrhythmic clapping at the concert sounded like a group of confused seals.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like an arrhythmic dance, unpredictable and chaotic.
meanings.sent5: The flickering lights created an arrhythmic pattern on the wall.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to a regular beat or pattern
meanings.sent1: The arrhythmic raindrops fell randomly on the roof.
meanings.sent2: The arrhythmic tapping on the window distracted her from studying.
meanings.sent3: The arrhythmic chirping of the birds outside made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His footsteps echoed in an arrhythmic manner down the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The wind created an arrhythmic melody through the trees.
